title: Rohit Sharma will go to a franchise which treats him better than Mumbai Indians.
text: Is Rohit Sharma about to leave Mumbai Indians? Is he already in talks with other franchises? The questions are plenty and never-ending. At the moment, there is nothing official about this but the whispers are getting louder with each passing day. Rohit was replaced by Hardik Pandya as the MI captain ahead of IPL 2024, a move which hasn't gone down well with a large section of MI fans and to a certain extent, even the majority of the cricket fraternity in India.

title: Delhi Capitals beats Lucknow Super Giants by six wickets
text: Delhi Capitals beats Lucknow Super Giants by six wickets
